title: Log In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is NOT logged in
AND they attempt to go to mlb.com/tv
AND the user is redirected to the Log In page (mlb.com/login)
OR the user clicks the Login button (located at the top-right corner of the mlb.com page, represented by a user/profile icon)
OR the user selects the login button from the subscription page (if they are redirected to subscribe)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user enters a valid "Email"
AND the user clicks "Continue"
AND the user enters a valid "Password"
AND the user clicks the "Log In" button
custom_expected:
THEN the user is successfully logged in
AND the user land on the Welcome Center

**NOTE: users may be redirected to different pages after login depending on where they are attempting to gain access to.**
EX: selecting a game link would redirect a user back to that game after login

title: Log Out
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is already logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user hovers over the "ACCOUNT" button 
AND the user clicks the "Log Out" option
custom_expected:
THEN the logout screen should display 
AND the following message should appear "You have been logged out of MLB.com.You will be automatically redirected in 5 seconds"
AND the user should be redirected to the "MLB.com | The Official Site of Major League Baseball" page

title: Live Game Playback - Default
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in
AND the user is entitled for live playback
AND a live game is available
AND the user's settings are at default ( 'Start from the Beginning' is turned off)
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects a live game for playback from the Hero, Games tile, Media Center, or Team page
custom_expected:
THEN the user should land on the Games player
AND the selected live game should start playing from the current live point
AND the user should see the "LIVE" button displayed in red
**NOTE** Users can access to the "Start from the beginning” feature in the Games player by navigating to the Settings menu under the General tab.

title: Live Game Playback - Start from the Beginning
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in
AND the user is entitled for live playback
AND a live game is available
AND the "Start from the Beginning" feature is ON
custom_steps: WHEN  the user selects a live game for playback from the Hero, Games tile, Media Center, or Team page
custom_expected:
THEN the user should land on the Games player
AND the live game should begin playback from the start
AND the "LIVE" button should appear in gray on the progress bar

**NOTE** Users can access the "Start from the beginning” feature in the Games player by navigating to the Settings menu under the General tab.**
**NOTE:** If the game is already in progress, the beginning will be right before the 1st inning. If the game is not in progress, the beginning will be at the beginning of the stream

title: Archive Game Playback - Default
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user is logged in
AND the user setting are in default (OFF)
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects an archived game for playback
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the beginning of the stream
AND the duration of the game display right side of the scrubber bar
AND all available data is visible to the user (this includes innings and final scores)
**NOTE** Users can access the User Settings in the Games player by navigating to the Settings menu under the General tab.

title: Archive Game Playback - Hide Spoilers ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user is logged in
AND the users "HideSpoilers" setting are set to ON

**NOTE** Users can access to the 'Hide Spoiler' feature in the Games player by navigating to the Settings menu under the General tab.**
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects an archived game for playback
custom_expected:
THEN playback starts at the beginning of the stream
AND all available data is hidden from the user (this includes innings and final score)
AND the data is revealed inning by inning as playback progresses

custom_preconds:

custom_steps: WHEN a user selects "MLB.TV" in the navigation header
custom_expected:

title: Entitlements - MLBALL
custom_preconds: GIVEN the logged in user has MLBALL and SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects any content for playback

**NOTE: Excluded Live Content**
MVPD - ASG and Postseason
Partner - AppleTV+, Peacock
Blackouts - In-market games, ESPN Sunday Night Baseball
custom_expected: THEN the user receives successful playback of content

title: Entitlements - STP
custom_preconds: GIVEN the logged in user has MLBTV_STP_<team_tri_code> and SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects any content for playback

**NOTE: Excluded Live Content**
MVPD - ASG and Postseason
Partner - AppleTV+, Peacock
Blackouts - In-market games, ESPN Sunday Night Baseball
Games that do not involve the subscribed team
custom_expected: THEN the user receives successful playback of entitled content

title: Entitlements - At Bat
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the logged in user has IPHONEATBAT, ANDROIDATBAT and SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlements

NOTE: At Bat subscribers have the following entitlements: MLBAUDIO, IPHONEATBAT, ANDROIDATBAT, SUBSCRIBERVOD, MiLBALL
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects any game content for playback
OR the user selects any VOD, SVOD, FLIVE, SLIVE, or out-of-market Free Game of the Day

**NOTE:** Excluded Live Content
MVPD - ASG and Postseason
Partner - AppleTV+, Peacock
Blackouts - In-market games, ESPN Sunday Night Baseball
Games that do not involve the subscribed team
custom_expected:
THEN the user receives successful playback of entitled **Audio content**
OR they successfully receives playback for the VOD, SVOD, FLIVE, SLIVE, or out-of-market Free Game of the Day

title: Entitlements - Free
custom_preconds: GIVEN the logged in user is a Free user with no entitlements
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects any VOD, FLIVE, or out-of-market Free Game of the Day
OR the user selects any SVOD, SLIVE, or non-Free Game of the Day
custom_expected:
THEN the successfully receives playback for the VOD, FLIVE, or out-of-market Free Game of the Day
OR the user cannot playback any SVOD, SLIVE, or non-Free Game of the Day

title: Entitlements - MLBALL International User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the logged in user has MLBALL and SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlements
AND the users country code is NOT US or CA
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects any content for playback
custom_expected: THEN the user receives successful playback of content

title: Entitlements - MLBALL International User across the dateline
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the logged in user has MLBALL and SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlements
AND the users country code is NOT US or CA
AND there is a live game that has a different dateline than the user
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects content that has a different dateline for playback

For example: 
Country code US - game time 8pm EST on 10/16 = Country code JP - game time 9am EST on 10/17
custom_expected: THEN the user receives successful playback of content

title: Closed Captions ON

Given the user is authenticated and logged in
And closed captions are enabled in the Settings

WHEN a user plays any video content that they are entitled to
